resources.string: The average American household contains about 62 toxic chemicals

string-array.name: quiz
string-array.item: I use products containing Phthalates (commonly found in perfumes and colognes)
My toothpaste contains Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
I use products containing Triclosan (commonly found in hand and dish soap)
I use products containing Parabens (commonly found in deodorant and makeup)
I use skin whitener or skin bleacher
My glass polisher contains ammonia
I use disinfectant wipes containing 2-butoxyethanol
I rarely use public transportation services (bus, train, etc)
My fabric softener contain Quaternary Ammonium salts
I use antiperspirants containing Aluminum, Propylene Glycol, or Parabens
I leave the lights on when I leave the house
My vehicle gets less than 30 miles per gallon
I use compact fluorescent lightbulbs
I drink bottled water
I flush my unused prescription drug down the toilet
I use plastic bag to carry my groceries
I leave the faucet on when I brush my teeth and shave
My house contains appliances older than 15 years
I use lipstick containing leads
I use artificial air freshener
